oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The application of ecological principle in organic crop production
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jensen, Erik Steen
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: It is vital to develop production systems built in its self upon a desire for considering the conditions relating to nature, environment, animal welfare, animal health, food quality etc. The aim is that organic principles may reflect in the organic products and with that appear as reliable alternatives to conventional products.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Jensen, Erik Steen (2002) The application of ecological principle in organic crop production. Speech at: 3rd Australian Organic Agriculture Symposium, Perth, Western Australia, 12 October.
